関連科目: This is a high-level, English-only "content-based" course. Therefore, it is preferable for students to have already taken similar high-level courses like: Listening and Speaking 3, Critical Writing and thinking, language and Communication
授業方法:
For the Fall semester 2025, this course will be held face to face

Students will NEED access to a computer at home (not just a smartphone) or use a school computer lab to complete and submit assignments properly. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are free).

Lessons will foster student autonomy and enhance students' ability to critically assess written materials and oral presentations/lectures in an English-only environment.

Students can expect regular teacher lectures, and presentations, and actively discuss and review course content through pair work or small groups

トピック.授業外学習2:
Students must have regular access to computers and the internet either at home or through an on-campus computer lab. Online, on-demand or simultaneous interactive tasks may be required.

The amount of study time for homework will vary from week to week and will depend on 1) the content being reviewed, and 2) the ability of individual students to understand the content to complete tasks. However, students can expect to do a minimum of 1 hours and a maximum of 2 hours of study each week.

In some cases, students will need to review and assess a segment of film multiple times in preparation for or prior to completing an assignment
